properties.name: Jericho
properties.description: An ancient city mentioned in the Bible.

properties.name: Jerusalem
properties.description: The holy city and capital of ancient Israel.

properties.name: Babylon
properties.description: A major city of the Babylonian Empire, located near modern Baghdad.

properties.name: Nineveh
properties.description: An ancient Assyrian city near modern Mosul.

properties.name: Mount Sinai
properties.description: The mountain where Moses received the Ten Commandments.

properties.name: Alexandria
properties.description: A prominent city of ancient Egypt, home to a famous library.

properties.name: Damascus
properties.description: One of the oldest continuously inhabited cities in the world.

properties.name: Capernaum
properties.description: A town on the Sea of Galilee where Jesus performed many miracles.

properties.name: Hebron
properties.description: An ancient city associated with Abraham and the burial site of the patriarchs.

properties.name: Beersheba
properties.description: A city often referred to as the southernmost border of ancient Israel.

properties.name: Shiloh
properties.description: The site of the Tabernacle during the time of the Judges.

properties.name: Gaza
properties.description: A Philistine city mentioned in the Bible.

properties.name: Megiddo
properties.description: An ancient city known for its strategic location and biblical significance.
